Locale.Value:
Fully Empowered by AI!
Experience the Power of AI: Chat with AI for personalized assistance with customized persona and prompts.
AI-Powered Document Support: Get all the answers about your PDF with AI's comprehensive knowledge.
Enhanced Session Management: Enjoy support for new sessions and access your session history easily.
AI Touch-Up for Flawless PDFs: With just one click, proofread and get suggestions for document improvements.
Seamless Translation: Effortlessly translate your documents for better readability.
AI Summarization to Markdown: Summarize PDFs and convert them into Markdown format for streamlined note-taking.
Immersive AI Read Mode: Immerse yourself in AI-enabled reading experiences.
Intelligent Scanned Document Correction: Instantly deskew scanned documents with a single click.
Optimized AI Summarization: Experience a simpler and more efficient operation.
Unleash Comprehensive PDF Features!
Advanced Electronic Signatures: Request, track, and sign electronic signatures across cloud, mobile, and desktop.
Enhanced PDF Management: Quickly access all your PDFs in the recent folder for seamless PDFs organization.
Superior Compression Efficiency: Optimize compression capabilities for a 20% improvement in document compression.
Smooth Document Rendering: Enjoy improved document rendering capabilities and smooth scrolling.
Revamped UI:
Cutting-Edge Visuals: Immerse yourself in a technologically advanced UI design with a complete visual overhaul.
Customizable Navigation Bar: Collapse the top, bottom, left, and right navigation bars and tailor them to your preference for an enhanced reading area.
Upgrade to PDFelement V10 now and embrace a whole new level of AI-driven efficiency and productivity!
